metadata.title: CVE-2012-4003 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in GLPI-PROJECT GLPIbefore 0.83.3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4003` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glpi - 0.83.31-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.83.31-1').
